[[inst_hl_sd_po]]
==== HL.SD.PO

*Syntax:* hl.sd.po SrcD, [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<3], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_sd_po.svg[HL.SD.PO encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/POST_INDEX
